author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/the-rise-of-the-golden-idol/

A city consumed by sin. Follow Roy Samson and his new partner, Cliff Savea, on the case to solve four brand new scenarios dealing with an organized crime syndicate plaguing the big smoke of New Wells. The Award-winning detective saga, The Rise of the Golden Idol, continues with new DLC Golden Idol Investigations- The Sins of New wells!   Season pass and DLC available for purchase now on PlayStation.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games
title: The Rise of the Golden Idol - Golden Idol Investigations: The Sins of New Wells | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Oscar Guzman’s been plotting a triumphant return to the smuggling scene, and he’s looking for a partner to haul intercepted gang shipments of ammunition and arms.

Reconnect with the notorious arms trafficker to take over Trevor's old McKenzie Airfield Hangar in Oscar Guzman Flies Again, now available in GTA Online.

Combine an aviator’s flair with cutting-edge tech to even the score with Eberhard Munitions, steal goods in new Arms Trafficking missions, and much more.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #gta5 #gta #gtav #gtaonline
title: GTA Online - Oscar Guzman Flies Again Now Available | PS5 & PS4 Games

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #tonyhawkproskater

author: PlayStation
description:
Fight as the outcast heroes of Talamh in a fierce battle to retake magic from Sun King Azra’s
grasp in Absolum, an original roguelite beat ‘em up by Dotemu, available on Playstation 4 and Playstation 5 later this year.

Lead the uprising against Azra's regime as a lone hero, or team up with a friend on your couch or with coop. Combine your elemental powers and synchronize your attacks into incredible chained combos!

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games
title: Absolum - Reveal Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/powerwash-simulator/

Step into Aardman's wonderful world of Wallace & Gromit with the latest special pack coming to PowerWash Simulator.

Get up close and personal with some of Wallace's wacky creations, such as the Knit-O-Matic and stop for some cheese and crackers on West Wallaby Street 🧀

Available now on PlayStation 5 & PlayStation 4!

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #powerwashsimulator #wallaceandgromit
title: PowerWash Simulator - Wallace & Gromit Special Pack Launch Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

Dollhouse: Behind The Broken Mirror Physical Edition arrives March 28 in stores. Pre-order now and secure your entry into the nightmare.
 
Explore the abandoned Dollhouse mansion and unravel the truth behind Eliza's fragmented past. Step between two haunting realities, solve complex puzzles, and face sinister dolls that watch your every move.

#ps5 #ps5games #dollhouse
